list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: extending or moving uniformly in one direction only; without a curve or bend.
properly positioned so as to be level, upright, or symmetrical.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he made sure his tie was straight
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy chắc chắn rằng cà vạt của anh ấy thẳng

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he scored his fourth straight win
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy đã ghi được chiến thắng thứ tư của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (especially of drama) serious as opposed to comic or musical; employing the conventional techniques of its art form.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she looked pretty straight in her school clothes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy trông khá thẳng trong quần áo đi học của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was gazing straight at her
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh đang nhìn thẳng vào cô.

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: in or into a level, even, or upright position.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta kéo quần áo của mình thẳng

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I'm so tired I can hardly think straight
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi rất mệt mỏi Tôi khó có thể nghĩ thẳng

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he remembered working sixteen hours straight
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh nhớ làm việc mười sáu giờ thẳng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a part of something that is not curved or bent, especially a section of a racetrack.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he pulled away in the straight to win by half a second
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta kéo đi thẳng để giành chiến thắng một nửa giây

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in poker) a continuous sequence of five cards.
